list_definition.definition: (the act of gaining) a skill, achievement etc (eg an examination pass) that makes (a person) able or suitable to do a job etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: What qualifications do you need for this job?

list_definition.definition: something that gives a person the right to do something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She has the residential qualification to become a citizen.

list_definition.definition: a limitation to something one has said or written

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I think this is an excellent piece of work – with certain qualifications.
